title: Government Titumir College

events.event_title: Dhaka: Free Kundalini Inner Energy Awakening Meditation Course
events.description: Seeking new horizons and self-discovery? Try Kundalini inner energy awakening in 21 Days with Free Sahaja Yoga Guided Meditation course.

research_history: Government Titumir College was founded in 1968 as a public college located in the Tejgaon area of Dhaka, Bangladesh. The college was named after Syed Mir Nisar Ali Titumir, a prominent Bengali freedom fighter who played a crucial role in the fight against British colonial rule in the region.
